97. opengl.actors — OpenGL Actors.¶

This module defines all OpenGL Actors that are directly available to the users.

class opengl.actors.PlaneActor(n=(1.0, 0.0, 0.0), P=(0.0, 0.0, 0.0), size=(1.0, 1.0, 0.0), color='white', alpha=0.5, mode='flatwire', linecolor='black', **kargs)[source]¶

A plane in a 3D scene.

The default plane is perpendicular to the x-axis at the origin.
